name: PassingThought
0:
”Alexa, open Passing Thought and surprise me”
”Alexa, open Passing Thought and what is the passing thought for today”
”Alexa, open Passing Thought and read a passing thought”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: passing thought
des: Life can be so much richer if we are constantly reminded of pieces of wisdom. The Passing Thought skill gives you exactly that. One piece of wisdom a day that you can use in your personal life and work.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
